ygData.subject: Re: It was worth a try
ygData.msgSnippet: Deep down inside Lady Hawk felt almost insulted by the implication that she might be Maximal. You will lower your tone in my presence! she exclaimed, folding

Deep down inside Lady Hawk felt almost insulted by the implication that she
might be Maximal. "You will lower your tone in my presence!" she exclaimed,
folding her wings at her side to look more appropriate as royalty. "The
rules of courtesy state that we conduct exchanges of words based on
civility." the female bot stated as suredly as it had been told to her a
cycle ago. " Not according to the obvious difference in our social skills.
The snide female looked down on Baterra without trying.

"To answer your first question I was sent here by DevilDuer to work for the
alliance" she paused for a moment before breaking one of the rules of
courtesy "your second question I am a scientist working with DNA ingrading."
Her eyes met Battera with a holier than thou look that royalty so often has
with a commoner. "And your third question should be obvious even to a
serving bot that I am not a Maximal.":

her gaze turned cold with disbelief that a nobody would have an attitude
toward a higher being such as herself. "And don't even consider your
autoguns a threat, if I'd worried about them they wouldn't still exist."
Lady Hawk turned her back to Baterra as if to brush her aside, "I eliminate
anything that I find" She glanced back a moment to hint at her words. "A
nuisance."


----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, October 05, 2000 7:13 AM
Subject: Re: It was worth a try


> ::Battera::
> She looked at the bot standing before her, a bot with the arrogance
> of that to match  the size of the continant they were standing on.
>
> "Oh, Forgive me. I had no ideawe had royalty coming." she said in a
> very sarcastic voice. "Now state your business." She blocked the door
> and looked sternfully at the her. "Or the autoguns will open fire.
> What are you? Maximal?"
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > The Autoguns swung around to face Lady Hawk, they weren't firing so
> she must
> > have done something right. She stared at the scanner trying to piece
> > together her mistake. She thought hard for a few moments before the
> > realization hit her. she'd stayed in her half organic mode so the
> scanners
> > picked up her as well as Devilduer. "Well if thats the way you want
> to play
> > this game I can play too." if the guns were to fire she'd be ready.
> >
> > Battera's cold greeting caught Lady Hawk off gaurd. a quick relapse
> of the
> > battle helped her a little. "I am Lady Hawk, daughter of Veratis
> and member
> > of the royal family of Avaria. and I find it to be an insult to
> have your
> > guns facing me.
> >
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: <Yanshosh@a...>

> >
> > > ::Zardus/Dark One/Alliance Base::
> > >
> > > Zardus looks from Battera to Dark One, who had just come up to
> him,
> > carrying
> > > Squizzy. His wrist comp beeps a bit, reporting a bot near the
> door. He
> > taps a
> > > few keys to stop the autoguns from opening fire.
> > >
> > > "There's a bot near the entrance," he says to Battera, "Can you
> show her
> > in,
> > > ask her what she wants, and make sure she doesn't go loose in the
> base? I
> > > have to attend to this bot."
> > >
> > > He takes Squizzy from Dark One, walking off toward the lab.
> > > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > > The Alliance base's autoguns recognize DevilDuer's DNA, but also
> recognize
> > > Lady Hawk's. The doors stay closed, the autoguns aiming at Lady
> Hawk,

> > > to fire just in case.
